Name: De Kletskop

Name: De Kletskop
Review Text:
Súper cool people, the bartender was super nice and explained us some things about Amsterdam, very cozy...like been around friends.
Well located and full stocked.

Name: De Kletskop
Review Text: Had a great evening in this cafe in the centre of Amsterdam! Nice mix of people, old, young, enjoying the friendly bartenders and company!

Review Text: Cosy local pub near the central station and Amsterdam red light district. Good beer selection and friendly service.
